org.apache.hadoop.hbase

Class HTestConst

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HTestConst

  • public class HTestConst
extends Object
    Similar to HConstants but for tests. Also provides some simple static utility functions to generate test data.
